text: Izvika (), Naglas (наглас) or Kajda (кајда) is a traditional polyphonic folk singing in southwestern Serbia, in the Zlatibor region (Užice), although similar styles are also found in Vlasotince and other parts of the country. It is sung in a duet. A folk dance, sakajdo, accompanies the singing. ==See also== *Ojkanje ==References== ==Sources== * * * ==External links== * * * Category:Serbian folk music Category:Polyphonic singing
title: Izvika
